channel.title: CVE Feed for Six Apart Ltd. -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-45746|2024-08-02T20:29:32.220Z -- six%20apart%20ltd. -- movable%20type%207%20%28movable%20type%207%20series%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Movable Type series allows a remote authenticated attacker to inject an arbitrary script. Affected products/versions are as follows: Movable Type 7 r.5405 and earlier (Movable Type 7 Series), Movable Type Advanced 7 r.5405 and earlier (Movable Type 7 Series), Movable Type Premium 1.58 and earlier, Movable Type Premium Advanced 1.58 and earlier, Movable Type Cloud Edition (Version 7) r.5405 and earlier, and Movable Type Premium Cloud Edition 1.58 and earlier.
